content.detailedDescription:
Took my dogs out at 4:30am and saw this spinning red blue green light thru the pine trees.
i looked thru field glasses and it was clearly spinning and slowly moving to the south.  my wife came outside and saw it too.  we have never seen anything like this before!
content.summary: I saw spinning red blue green se of huntington lake between pine trees at 7200 feet

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on front lawn.... actually asked for confirmation.... within seconds 8 very bright ,much larger than star orange/red spheres appeared from southwest....They slowly moved across the entire sky and eventually just faded out to the northwest. entire time was a good 5 minutes, was able to text my wife to get out "now"... she witnessed also. there was a plane within the viewing field of the cluster but much higher. they all stayed within the same formation slowly traveling across the entire western sky then just either faded out or ascended gradually.
as i said, i literally asked for confirmation about all this ufo stuff, and i got a response immediately.... i was genuinely grateful
my wife is very much a sceptic and yet... she could not explain
i took several photos with my iphone ....Not the best camera or results but, they all appear in the pics
content.summary: 8 very bright orange objects in formation

content.detailedDescription: Well i went out to my porch to smoke a cigarette and some thing came flashing from the sky like a flash light down to me street and flashed at me. then i realized that another object had again came to visit. this thing was like breathing flashing and dimming and continued with the same over and over again, plus it was moving in a slow way then it stop. i have never seen a star act like that.  i had made other reports to samuel a falvo. and i had tried to tell him about this. but anyway i have solid prof, i recorded this on video and at the mean time a police officer pass by and i stop him and he said it was moving,i recorded him too, he watch it for like 15 or 20 minutes then he left. i have solid prof and witness police officer who saw this on september 6 2013 friday. i like some one to come see this a.S.A.P. thank you..
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I stop a police and i have a vedio with the police.....

content.detailedDescription: M57 ring nebula just east of it. two lights become brighter and move  north east and faint out after 3 minutes or so. today the two lights are there again not moving no other start in the  chart showing this might be lights not stars?

content.detailedDescription: I was on grandville st in grand rapids, outside the intersection (a music venue), as there was a manic focus/gramatic show tonight. my good friend and i were heading back towards the intersection from the car, when we both saw a large, bright light rip through the sky. it was only present 1-2 secs. if it was an astroid ripping through our atmosphere, then it was the largest one i've ever seen. i really believe it was either a ufo, or a tear being ripped through the separation between the material world and the spiritual world. the light was bright white on the edges, and yellowish and purplish on the inside. it didn't really look like an astroid, i've seen those plenty of times! it appeared to bounce into our atmospheric shield and bounce away into space.
content.summary: Beautiful, bright light ripped through the sky. if it was an astroid, it was the biggest, closest one i've ever seen.

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in front of house w/ 2 others at approx. 8:15 pm. saw bright red/orange light moving quickly from the s/w toward the north then stopping in a parked position less than 1/4 mile away. object remained for approx 2 min. then appeared to ascend and then dull out (slowly dissipate) this is the 2nd one i have seen w/in the last 3 months in the same direction around same time of day. we recorded it on an i phone for 1:58 min's
content.summary: Very bright burning orb moving toward us then stopped and parked in place

content.detailedDescription: Got home around 1045 pm , noticed a green laser like light pulsating into tree  moving in circular patterns. .Walked and drove around neighborhood. the beam was to high up to come from any of the single level homes here. this continues until i gave up and went to bed. but the unusual part is there was triangle shaped aircraft flying in odd patterns. tried to take video with phone but laser beam was to thin for our phones to record very well.
content.summary: Green laser beam appearing about every 10 seconds coming from sky

content.detailedDescription:
I had three different experiences in my life. first time at around 9 years old, i woke up when i hear my dog outside barking (wouf wouf) i go to the windows i saw a man levitating outside the windows and talking to me by spirit, i was afraid and hide myself under the curtains of my bed and he was still talking to me hovering inside the room over me.... another time at 15, we saw a weird flying object and we were four to see it.
at 21-22 years-old i choose to describe this because that was close to abduction.
so i weak up suddenly because i heard noise coming from the bathroom and the bedroom closet. so i ran out of my bed and ready to fight. then suddenly coming out of the closet i saw two ape shape wearing a white mask and floating from the floor and having an illuminated tools on their hands. then suddenly i was surrounded by four or five little live forms about 2-3 feet height and i was sensing that they were taking my fear against me to freeze me. i wanted to escape but these little man were getting closer and freeze me more each time they getting closer. the apes wanted to put the illuminated tools close to my brain. so i turn around to find a solution, and i saw my body still in the bed.... i jumped from the floor to regain my body and weak up again..... i do not know what to think.... 
can somebody live something similar!
content.summary: 100-150 feet cylinder type with square windows.

content.detailedDescription: I was watching opening night of the nfl football game and in start of the 3rd quarter i happen to catch a light shooting thru the sky. my friends and i decided to go back and take a better look. on my dvr in slow-mo you could make out a saucer looking shape moving at incredible speed. on pause its amazing. not sure if this is something cbs does to cause a stir but alot of ppl must have this on the dvr also. i will attach a clip i took from my iphone taken of my tv.
content.summary: Ufo over mile high stadium. have on my dvr (slow-mo) incredible

content.detailedDescription:
On early saturday morning.  my husband and i saw a green light morphing and changing positions.  we kept looking and we saw different shaped shadows.  when the sun came up we went out side and recorded what we could see. it was almost like we saw another dimension.  my phone camera picked up these entities better than the naked eye.  we saw these colorful figures dancing around and seemed to go up a tree.  next we saw what looked like to be a metal object going up the road.  it was small and round with blue lights on the side.  after we kept looking we saw a green thing behind a tree 20 feet away.  it could see us.  it would distort my video camera's view.  i was not scared.  i was intrigued. early sunday morning, i saw what looked to be like a 3 foot tall creature with big eyes walking up to my window.  i had my video camera on night vision.  i could not move.  finally my husband grabbed me and i showed him what i recorded.  he could not believe it.  sunday afternoon, my husband was gone and i was recording from my kitchen outside to see what i could see.  i saw two men watching me behind my son's swing set.  i called the police and told him about the men and they made me seem crazy.  now as far as those videos go.  two weeks later, i was scared and deleted the video off my camera.  i was not able to upload this footage onto my computer, youtube, or facebook.  i could not do anything with the footage. i was scared so i deleted the good video.  it still may be in verizon wireless land.  also, the night vision one off of my camera got deleted in the commotion with the police.  i let everything go.  then i saw about bucks county and denise's story seemed similar.   i started looking through the footage i took after that weekend.  you can see pulsating lights and what looked to be an entity in my woods.  i gave my chip from my video camera to someone who said she was affiliated with you all.  i would like to show you my footage.  i would also like to know if i am in danger.  some of the leaves on my trees have died.  my back yard is covered with these dead leaves.  can you help me? i am going to call this lady to get my footage back.  i just feel scared, i don't know what these things are capable of.  i don't know hat the government is capable of.  so far i have not heard of any story like ours.  
i also showed the video from my phone to about ten people. they said it was crazy and almost looked like some one was projecting these things...But why would they do that?
content.summary: In a weekend i n june we saw and recorded sometype of entity on the ground.  for two nights in a row we saw something.  for the next two weeks lights pulsated all in the trees.  the limbs glow.  now where i saw all of this the limbs are broken all in arow

content.detailedDescription:
I stepped out for a break around 9:40am (est) from work and was watching a commercial jet cruising around 30k feet above me.  from the area southwest of the jet, a bright reflection from the sun caught my eye.  as i watched it, the reflection disappeared and i could actually see something (with an outline of a small craft) moving east .  it was approximately 1/4-1/3 the size of the jet.  it was shiny and very silvery just before the sun reflected a bright white color from it.  it appeared as a disc/sphere in shape.  when the sun didn't reflect off it, it would be a darker gray or even at times have a red/orange cast to it.  mostly, it stayed gray or very shiny silver.  it made no sound and didn't leave any trail.  at times it would seem to stop or hoover, then continue east.  it never sped up to any extreme speed.  just "cruising" would be a good way to describe it.
  
just as the jet flew off to the west, the object continued on it's way east.  sometimes heading north, sometimes heading south, but then continuing due east.  the craft was not moving as fast as the plane and even though they seemed to be heading towards each other at one point, there was a large distance between them.  the craft was much closer to earth then the plane.  i could visibly see both plane and object.  it traveled higher than a helicopter would fly, but lower then any of the commercial jets would fly.  there was no other airplanes (commercial or non commercial) or helicopters in the area. the only "clouds" were entrails that the commercial jets made against a brilliant, clear blue sky.  the duration was for more than 15 minutes, but less than 20 minutes.
the emotions i felt were amazement, excitement, happiness.  i wasn't fearful or worried.  this was the first time i have witnessed an object that i couldn't identify during the daylight hours.  in the past, i have seen a few crafts, but only at night.  
as my break time was overextended, i had to leave the view of the object, which was still heading east.  last i saw was the old entrails the commercial jet left and the craft was then blocked from my view.  i did return to another area to view where this object might have been (approximately 5 mins later) but i never saw it again.  

i do have pictures of the reflections this object gave off by the sun hitting the sides of it.  some pictures don't require "zooming", but some do.  also, i have a video that shows how the object moved and how the sun reflected off of it.  the video may need to be zoomed in and/or watched from the middle section and down at the bottom of the video, as i was able to capture part of the object (mainly in the beginning of the video) moving.  the sun was intense, i couldn't see the viewing screen and i wasn't able to center the object for very long.  i accidentally moved it out of the camera's view.  but you can see the object reflecting many times during this short period of time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Shiny silver sphere/disc like object cruising a clear, blue sky in clinton twp, mi

content.detailedDescription: My son and i were driving at night, so it was completely dark, and i saw what looked like maybe a plane on fire in the sky in the distance southeast of us.  we rolled down the windows and opened the sunroof to try and get a better look at it as it kept moving northwest and knew that it was something that i felt i needed to get on video if possible.  the object appeared as a solid flame that resembled when the rope on a hot air balloon is pulled to release gas into it.  but there was no balloon above it and the flame stayed constantly flickering brightly as it went across the sky.  i would estimate it took about 10 minutes to disappear from our view in the western sky.  we were baffled as to what we had just seen and still have no explanation for it.  neither of us have ever seen anything out of the ordinary in our lives.  the height was approximately what a normal cloud would be.
content.summary: Large bright fire ball in the sky at night moving west

content.detailedDescription: Picture shows all
content.summary: Driving this object appeard i pulled car iver and took picture. then i disappeared was there about 30 seconds

content.detailedDescription:
My son was laying on the deck sun at 2:30am smoking and looking at the stars casually when he saw a shadowy figure with 5 lites(he thought) and he could see it because it blocked the stars as it passed overhead. he said it veered to the west as if to avoid some storm clouds to the east. and he lost site of it.
he said it moved quick but not super fast. he thought it was a flock of birds but no wing flapping or honking....Just silence, and didn't know how they were lit, so he can't figure it out.  

then! sunday 9-1-13 at 11:15pm there was another sighting by 5 family members...All men. this time it went s to n and they described it as boomerang shape shadow in the sky with lites of various sizes that were yellow/orange. moving quick and not sure of height in sky, but guessed it to be 20' wide. no sound. they said it was like the lites were meant to camoflage with the stars, except that it was noticed due to the movement and that it blocked the stars as it passed over.
one guy tried to get it on his phone but missed it.

they all were be fuddled and said they've never seen anything like it.

we think it's a military drone or secret military stuff.
content.summary: Appeared as a shadow with lites that went n to s

content.detailedDescription: I was watching what i believed to be a satellite traveling overhead in a southeasterly direction,when i was surprised by a larger triangular object that appeared in my field of vision following a short distance behind it! i noticed it get brighter and then fade several times as it continued on its southeasterly path. it seemed to move smoothly,and unwaveringly as it passed,and just appeared to become enveloped into the darkness of the night sky. i strained to make out details but could only ascertain its' triangular shape! i personally felt that the object i was witnessing was beyond our atmosphere,and like the satellite that preceded it,the object was reflecting light from our sun! from a 12 o-clock high beginning of the sighting,to about a 2 o-clock high ending,the event took about 25 seconds!
content.summary: Looking straight up,triangular object reflected(sunlight?)dimmed several times,then faded from view

content.detailedDescription: I was in boseman montana at the malbro  ranch. saw this object in the middle of the mountains while snowmobiling.
content.summary: Did not notice till i looked at the picture

content.detailedDescription:
my memory may not serve all that correctly as i was only 11 (i think) at the time.  i could be off considerably in regard to date and time.

    i grew up on hinckley street in mystic, ct.  along with typical interests of young people such as sports and collecting cards, i also had an interest in the natural world (e.G. ornithology, herpetology, etc.,etc) and also astronomy.  as a young person i did volunteer work at the nearby planetarium which is part of the local maritime museum.  i'm always reluctant to mention what i was doing at the time of the sighting as it adds to the sense of a young person with an overactive imagination, thus probably not credible; however, i'll answer the question here with the emphasis that my activity at the time and the sighting were in no way related.  i was looking at something (don't remember which celestial body and it was to the south, not east) through a refracting telescope. i was at the end of my parents' driveway. 

    i remember raising my head for a moment and my left side peripheral vision caught something unnaturally bright to the east. i turned to face whatever it was (maybe 085 degrees from my position).  i think my best description of what i remember seeing that night after, almost 40 years of thinking about it often, was a flying rectangular disc with extremely vibrant rotating white-yellow lights.  i cannot recall whether the rotation of the lights was clockwise or counterclockwise, maybe the former but i'm not sure at all. from my perspective the left side of the object was dipped a little lower than the right.  

    as mentioned , the object was to the relative east of my position and was flying in a sww direction, sort of towards my position but the ground path would have been a bit to my south. it wasn't flying all that fast at the time.  my best guess on distance from my position would be anywhere from 1,500 feet to maybe as much as a mile, again, i wish this were more recent.  i doubt the altitude would have been more than 300'.  looking at mapquest i would say it's position would have placed it anywhere between the woods behind my neighborhood and the mystic reservoir.  it may have been over the pequotsepos nature center. i'd be surprised if it hadn't been observed by some motorists traveling northbound on interstate 95 after passing exit 90.  

    unfortunately my curious nature was unable to override my sense of survival as the ol' "fight or flight" instinct kicked in and i ran into the garage and into the house after having watched this thing for no longer than half a minute.  around that age i would always look up to try and identify aircraft types, i collected small pre-fabricated models, and was always up for the challenge of identifying aircraft.  i would always get excited at the sight of a meteor and knew perfectly well what they were having volunteered at the planetarium.  later in life i would obtain a private pilots license. believe me, i, as an 11 year old with an abundance of interests and with a strong desire to know as much as i could, wanted no part of whatever this thing was.  i could always recall, as could my parents, how shook up i was that evening by seeing whatever this thing was.  it had given me a feeling of great unease.  

    i should mention that prior to that evening i was aware of the ufo phenomena.  i didn't think much about it.  my parents had told me before that sometimes people would see things that defied explanation.  they didn't claim to know what they were and i don't think they gave it much thought. 

    later that evening i called a friend to tell him what i saw.  before i could get the words out of my mouth he told me what he had seen earlier that night.... the same thing. his perspective would have been from the southern half of hewitt road in mystic, maybe about a mile away from my position by air and to the south.

    clearly i've never forgotten the experience of seeing this thing.  i've often wondered what i would do if i had seen it as an adult.  maybe just try to remain inconspicuous and study it from a safe place.  i don't know.  i know this report isn't of much help given the elapsed time, and even i'll admit that it's being told by someone who was around 11 years of age at the time of the sighting and that might raise some questions of accuracy.  but i did my best to explain the sighting and it feels good to be able to share this account and offer it for the historical files.
content.summary: Rectangular disc, very bright and vibrant white or yellow lights quickly rotating on surface of flying object.

content.detailedDescription: Well i went to take my son to his bus stop this morning and the sun was not fully risen yet as i was drinking my cofe and speaking to another mother my son had noticed an orb near the sun i said oh that's a planet then as i further looked i noticed that it was floating and it was for certainly not a plane there was no noise and it was moving up and down it appeared then disappeared. as my sons bus came he got on so i walked back home whit my other two children. five minute later as my second son and i were sitting on our porch i noticed a shinny object it was getting closer it had no noise to it and it was shinny then as it was coming just above my neighbors house it just dissappeard (pulsated). after that there was a helicopter flying around the area where everything took place. let me just say that this is now the fourth time that i've seen these orbs around the neighborhood. but i must say why in the world would any (et)come in my area! there is nothing even worth picking up there.
content.summary: Pulsating orb in neighboorhood

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone today: 
i was near the art palace museum at forest park in st. louis in front near the statue of a king - this is at the top of art hill.  i turned and saw orange lights in the sky - a lot of them - waves of them flying in loose v shapes with 10-15 lights in each v shape and moving very fast. there was no sound and they were high in the sky - perhaps at 2,000 feet.  i could see the lights start at the horizon in the distance and move across the sky towards downtown st. louis.  i watched them for about for 30 minutes.  someone else was nearby - i could hear them talking but did not see them or talk to them.  the objects came from the direction opposite of downtown st. louis (west?), and they flew in a straight line. i saw jets flying over the area earlier that where very loud. these were much faster than jets. it would take a hand held at arm's length to block out one of the lights.  i would say there were 10-15 lights in each v pattern, and many v patterns flew over.  i did not have a camera with me at the time.  i saw another similar report so someone else must have seen this as well.
content.summary: Large fleet of orange orbs over st. louis

content.detailedDescription:
I reported this 10 years ago, a year after the event happened, either on this site or another. i figured i send it again. if it was this site then you can compare the noted and see the integrity of the statement. 

like i said, it was a decade ago so the time and date are extremely approximate. the year, however, was 2002. i'm pretty certain about that. i was in the army at the time. in the middle of a big war game at fort lewis, wa. it was late at night and i was pulling security. i was watching for a distance simulated tank battle out over the horizon with my night vision goggles on. it was a very quiet night despite the circumstances. that's when i heard a strange subtle whistling sound behind me. i turned around and that's when i saw this gigantic black triangle hovering towards my platoons position. my whole platoon was sleeping other than myself and my counterpart who was at the other side of the patrol base. right when i saw this black object, at first i thought it was a boomerang. it was idling. moving extremely slow. and it made no sound. the whistling was the wind hitting the object. the direction of movement was coming right towards me. it was still a couple hundred meters away and way less than that in elevation. i thought about throwing a rock at it, which i could have, but i thought i'd better not. i was mesmerized by the event. i had spent the previous years in 2nd ranger bat. jumping out of airplanes and helicopters as an airborne infantryman. i knew this object was moving too slow to be a plane and too quiet to be a helicopter. i instantly knew what it was not. the event lasted quite awhile. as the object moved closer to my position and eventually overtop of it, i pulled my night vision goggles down and then up repeatedly. i wanted to get a grasp of what i was looking at. i eventually discerned that the boomerang was a triangle. the object was black. the size was proportional to that of a major league baseball diamond. the side points were wider than that of 1st and 3rd base. this object was gigantic. as time went on, i noticed a couple times where the object emitted light on the sides. first it was the 2 sides just posterior to the front point. it did this a couple times and i don't recall seeing them other than when the nvg's were on. as the object continued on, as it passed over my head and idled away, i realized that it was actually diamond shaped moving in the direction of one of it's points. i saw rear lights near but not on the rear point. that's how i differentiated it into a diamond and not a triangle. as it continued to hover away, i ran and woke up a friend so he would see it. he was groggy and by the time i got to him he couldn't tell what it was. i later went and talked to my counterpart that was pulling security at that particular time. he said he didn't see anything, which means he was sleeping on guard duty. over the first couple years i told a few people about it and then decided not to. i figured that i would have to see it to believe it and since i can replicate the experience, what's the point of talking? but over the years, i've heard others talk about low hovering black triangles. there's even a wikipedia page! well, that's my story. someday i'm going to get a black triangle ufo. it was a profound experience. thanks for letting me share. sorry if this is convoluted. it's been awhile.
content.summary: Black triangle hovered over my position. whistling from breaking wind. lasted 5 mninutes.

content.detailedDescription: Woke up and went downstairs to go to the bathroom.  i noticed that the window was lit up so i got up to see what the light was. that is when i saw a large circle with large rectangle shape windows, each a different vibrant color. had around 4 different color windows (repeating colors) going all around. the rectangle windows where with the longer side up and down. didn't move, just hovered. absolutely no noise. was at the treetop - part of the left side was just below the top of the treetop of the tree on the left side (northeast) of the road. it extended across the street to the top of another tree. i was in awe and couldn't take my eyes off it, then i thought after 2 to 3 minutes to get my camera to video tape it, but it was gone by time i got back.  went outside to see if i could see it and tape it, but it was no where in sight. i got scared that it would come back and went back inside my house. this happened at 2 a.M. at the end of september or august 2012. the windows were so vibrant but you couldn't see anything inside of them. it wasn't very far away from me. it definitely was a ufo. i just don't understand how this object could have stayed up without some kind of noise/propeller or something. i could not see anything metal to hold the windows together either. i just don't understand how this could be. it was so close (across from our neighbors house) that i saw it clear as day.
content.summary: Hovered just at treetops. no noise. large rectangle shape windows in a circle. nothing in middle of circle. no movement.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck grilling dinner near dusk and i could hear an airplane so i turned and looked up and the sky was a beautiful blue color with pink clouds and pink after trails from multiple planeswhen i noticed that there was something following a plane and closing in it i took out my iphone and started to video it for about 1 minute till i lost sight of it.. it was chrome in color saturn looking about the size of one wing. i'd say it was within 1000 below of the plane aproximenttly on the same path going faster then the plane. it traveled under the plane and past it with no path change from either one i video'ed this object till the house next door blocked my view.. it was awesome
content.summary: It was chrome in color. travling faster then the airplane within 1000 feet of it

content.detailedDescription:
I were near enbankment near river sava and photographing a test car, ford ranger.
during the afternoon after finished photographing, i check a photos and seen an unidentified object on two of them.
on first you can see a side of object and on second object is little bigger and looks as it flying towards me slightly tilted.
content.summary: During photographing on river sava in zagreb i catch a unidentified object with my camera, nikon d300
